title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. II, pt. 31 - Summary Suspension Of Insurance Law Licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. II, pt. 31 - Summary Suspension Of Insurance Law Licenses

State Regulations
§ 31.1 - Summary suspensions: general provisions
§ 31.2 - Notice and hearing: time limitations and other procedural requirements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. II, pt. 31

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, arts. 21, 68; State Administrative Procedure Act, §
401[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
